name: 3rd person project
description:
This is just to show off skills acquired through a tutorial.

WASD/ Left Joystick - movement 

Mouse/ Right Joystick - Move Camera

Left Mouse/ Button West - Attack

Space/ Button South - Jump

Tab/ Left Bumper - Lock On/ Off When in rang

Right Mouse/ Left Bumper - Block when locked on

Try Jumping on the side of the building on the hill
